an11.3:1.2: Avippatisare asati avippatisaravipannassa hatupanisam hoti pamojjam.
an11.3:1.3: Pamojje asati pamojjavipannassa hatupanisa hoti piti.
an11.3:1.4: Pitiya asati pitivipannassa hatupanisa hoti passaddhi.
an11.3:1.5: Passaddhiya asati passaddhivipannassa hatupanisam hoti sukham.
an11.3:1.6: Sukhe asati sukhavipannassa hatupaniso hoti sammasamadhi.
an11.3:1.7: Sammasamadhimhi asati sammasamadhivipannassa hatupanisam hoti yathabhutananadassanam.
an11.3:1.8: Yathabhutananadassane asati yathabhutananadassanavipannassa hatupanisa hoti nibbida.
an11.3:1.9: Nibbidaya asati nibbidavipannassa hatupaniso hoti virago.
an11.3:1.10: Virage asati viragavipannassa hatupanisam hoti vimuttinanadassanam.
an11.3:2.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, rukkho sakhapalasavipanno. Tassa papatikapi na paripurim gacchati, tacopi … pheggupi … saropi na paripurim gacchati.
an11.3:2.2: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, dussilassa silavipannassa hatupaniso hoti avippatisaro,
an11.3:2.3: avippatisare asati avippatisaravipannassa hatupanisam hoti pamojjam …pe…
an11.3:3.1: Silavato, bhikkhave, silasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti avippatisaro,
an11.3:3.2: avippatisare sati avippatisarasampannassa upanisasampannam hoti pamojjam,
an11.3:3.3: pamojje sati pamojjasampannassa upanisasampanna hoti piti,
an11.3:3.4: pitiya sati pitisampannassa upanisasampanna hoti passaddhi,
an11.3:3.5: passaddhiya sati passaddhisampannassa upanisasampannam hoti sukham,
an11.3:3.6: sukhe sati sukhasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti sammasamadhi,
an11.3:3.7: sammasamadhimhi sati sammasamadhisampannassa upanisasampannam hoti yathabhutananadassanam,
an11.3:3.8: yathabhutananadassane sati yathabhutananadassanasampannassa upanisasampanna hoti nibbida,
an11.3:3.9: nibbidaya sati nibbidasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti virago,
an11.3:3.10: virage sati viragasampannassa upanisasampannam hoti vimuttinanadassanam.
